title: Forever After All
description: Desperate and out of options, Elena Rousseau walks into a gentlemen’s club, ready to sell her body in a last attempt to save her mother’s life.She didn’t expect Alexander Kennedy to be there, and she certainly didn’t expect him to propose a marriage of convenience instead.Marrying Alexander means knowingly becoming a tool in his revenge plan.But what choice does she have?Better the devil you know than the one you don’t.Author's Note: This book contains a billionaire possessive alpha-hole and steamy scenes.
author: Catharina Maura
